name: No Break (Beta)
description:
You are a kart fan who loves to race with your friends, drive and feel the adrenaline of explosions and several things that you will unlock in the game. Remember that it is under development and maybe the description does not match the beta game

This game is under development, please rate and place a comment to motivate me to continue.

Controls:
Arrows: control the vehicle
Spacebar: Jump
Hold the spacebar: drift

Have fun :)
